hit 7-of-8 shots and was one of three Sixers to score 14 points. The return of Allen Iverson appeared to give Philadelphia a boost. Allen Iverson 's first game since Dec. 16 wasn't easy for the 34-year-old guard. Once Elgin Baylor got my second wind Elgin Baylor was all right. The first couple minutes Elgin Baylor thought my heart was going to jump out of my chest, said Allen Iverson , who in 31 minutes also handed out five assists and collected four rebounds. There were loud cheers for both Dick Cheney and Donald Rumsfeld . There was also some heckling by those in the crowd opposed to the war in Iraq and its costs. Still, the applause drowned out the boos. It's good to be here, Donald Rumsfeld told the crowd. "I have been around so long that I remember a time when CPAC did not exist, when Ronald Reagan was still an actor, when Barry Goldwater was our candidate for president and we only

domineering former US defense secretary- the late Robert McNamara - who came to describe the Vietnam War as "terribly wrong." "That's not the case with Iraq," Donald Rumsfeld said. I think the world's a better place with[ former Iraqi president] Saddam Hussein gone and with the Taliban gone and the al-Qaeda out of Afghanistan, he said, adding that the President Bush administration's decision to invade Iraq in the wake of the Sept. 11 attacks on the US was "incremental," not rushed.
